Key Match Events: The Guardians scored five runs before recording an out in the first inning of the game
Tyler Holton failed to record an out in the game
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Guardians used a bevy of bullpen arms in hopes of neutralizing the Tigers' platoon-averse lineup
Zach McKinstry's play on José Ramírez's knock was initially ruled as a critical error but later changed to an RBI double
Others: The Guardians have exploited matchups all season to reach this point
The Tigers were unable to capitalize on the favorable matchups they mapped out
